name: Cildo Meireles
image: Cildo Meireles davant de la seva obra ‘Entrevendo’.jpg
caption: MACBA
summary: Cildo Meireles (born 1948) is a Brazilian conceptual artist, installation artist and sculptor. He is noted especially for his installations, many of which express resistance to political oppression in Brazil. These works, often large and dense, encourage a phenomenological experience via the viewer's interaction.
